revised_title: Research on Monacid Polyamines and Their Transformations
tldr: The author investigates the formation and properties of monacid polyamines, specifically cyantriethyl-diamine and carbotriethyltriamine, through reactions involving cyanate of ethyl and ethylate of sodium. The transformation of cyanuric ether into ethylamine is also explored, revealing the role of water molecules in these reactions.
